title: [Plateau, Flynth River]
description: Fallen leaves covering the ground cavort in the breeze, resting again as the wind dies down.  The trees hide the north-south trail from the moons' gaze overhead, where the river gently curves towards the trail forming a wide bank.

Fallen leaves covering the ground cavort in the breeze, resting again as the wind dies down.  The trees shade the north-south trail from the fierce sun overhead, where the river gently curves towards the trail forming a wide bank.
